title: Selena Gomez spotted running into the home of Niall Horan in LA
text:
Eyebrows firmly raised (Picture: Backgrid/Getty)

Selena Gomez was spotted running into Niall Horan’s Los Angeles home and we have questions – could this be a new romance or a new collab?

Selena was carrying a bag full of groceries as she approached Niall’s property on Saturday, sparking further speculation the two could be an item.

The two were also seen looking cosy together at a group dinner on Thursday, in which the Nice To Meet Ya singer couldn’t seem to keep his hands to himself – wrapping an arm around the actress in an Instagram snap.

The 27-year-old seemed dressed down for her visit to Niall’s place, sporting denim cutoffs, a white sweatshirt, with Louis Vuitton purse over her shoulder as she carried a bag of food, including some ice cream and fruit salad.

What’s the rush Selena? (Picture: Backgrid)

The pair are long-time friends who have previously been at the centre of romance rumours – but it gets all the more interesting considering Niall is very much single since splitting with Hailee Steinfeld and Selena’s ex Justin Bieber is now happily married to Hailey Baldwin.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Niall has even spoke about how his latest album was somewhat inspired by his heartbreak over Hailee.

‘I had just gone through a break up, which helps when it comes to writing songs, I guess,’ the 26-year-old said. ‘It helps vent the emotions.’

Despite the gossip there’s apparently nothing to see here folks.

‘Selena and Niall are not dating and have been hanging out as friends, an insider told E!. ‘They have always been good friends and have kept in touch throughout the years.’

Courtney Lopez shared a shot from the group dinner in which Niall has his arm around Selena (Picture: Instagram)

The source added, ‘They both always have been very supportive of each other’s music and have talked about collaborating before.’

I mean if we can’t have the relationship at least we can enjoy the music right!

The singers have been super supportive of each other on Instagram, with the Bad Liar hitmaker spruiking Niall’s new bop Nice To Meet Ya in her stories on the night of the group dinner.

‘This came out like 5 min ago … and I’m pretty sure you need to download @niallhoran,’ she wrote.

How nice of Selena (Picture: Instagram)

Then earlier on Wednesday, Niall posted an Instagram story of himself posing alongside a giant image of Selena.

‘Hello there Sel,’ he wrote, tagging the artist.

The heart wants what it wants? (Picture: Instagram)

But this isn’t the first time Niall and Selena have been romantically linked.

Four years earlier the young stars sent the rumour mill into overdrive after a PDA packed display at Jenna Dewan’s birthday party in which they were spotted kissing, dancing, and hugging at the bash, according to E!.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Yet not long after Selena shut down any chatter that they were anything more than just friends.

‘Oh my god, no,’ she told ET Online of the romance rumors. ‘I love him, I always have. He’s amazing.’

Well we love them both so we will totally be keeping our eyes peeled for any further developments.

description: Selena Gomez was spotted running into the Niall Horan Los Angeles home and we have questions - could this be a new romance or a new collab?
